case_details.incident: Abduction of Mst. Sughran Bibi alias Mst. Arshan

court_orders.action: Petitioner produced abductee; abductee sent for medical examination.
Petitioner absented; bonds forfeited; non-bailable warrants issued.

revision_petitions.grounds: No show-cause notice issued before bond forfeiture.
No show-cause notice issued before bond forfeiture.

legal_provisions.section_514_1_crpc: Court must record grounds of proof and issue show-cause notice before bond forfeiture.

judgment_summary.reasoning: Failure to comply with Section 514(1) Cr. P. C.
judgment_summary.action: Order of bond forfeiture set aside; Sessions Judge directed to proceed according to law.
